title: Statistical Foundations of Data Science
description:
The module introduces basic theories and methods in
Statistics that are relevant for understanding data science.
Exploratory data analysis including heat map and
concentration map. Random variables. Joint distributions.
Expected values. Limit theorems. Estimation of parameters
including maximum likelihood estimation, Bayesian
approach to parameter estimation. Testing hypotheses and
confidence intervals, bootstrap method of finding
confidence interval, generalized likelihood ratio statistics.
Summarizing data: measures of location and dispersion,
estimating variability using Bootstrap method, empirical
cumulative distribution function, survival function, kernel
probability density estimate. Basic ideas of predictive
analytics using multiple linear and logistic regressions.
